description: Resource-specific logging allows you to specify a logging level for a specific thing group.

TargetType.description: The target type. Value must be THING_GROUP, CLIENT_ID, SOURCE_IP, PRINCIPAL_ID.
TargetType.markdownDescription:
The target type. Value must be THING_GROUP, CLIENT_ID, SOURCE_IP, PRINCIPAL_ID.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: THING_GROUP | CLIENT_ID | SOURCE_IP | PRINCIPAL_ID  
Update requires: Replacement

TargetName.markdownDescription:
The target name.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9.:_-]+  
Update requires: Replacement

LogLevel.description: The log level for a specific target. Valid values are: ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, or DISABLED.
LogLevel.markdownDescription:
The log level for a specific target. Valid values are: ERROR, WARN, INFO, DEBUG, or DISABLED.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ERROR | WARN | INFO | DEBUG | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetId.description: Unique Id for a Target (TargetType:TargetName), this will be internally built to serve as primary identifier for a log target.
TargetId.markdownDescription:
Unique Id for a Target (TargetType:TargetName), this will be internally built to serve as primary identifier for a log target.

Maximum Length: 140
